Hmm.. Makes me wanna put in a rule about being curteous to members, 
Alten. You obviously need practice in manners.

Rudra, I admit that I was a bit too strict, but as Alten pointed out 
over the message board while yelling at me for reprimanding him 
publicly, me and him don't get along. However, that wasn't the main 
reason I reprimanded, the post's subject matter was.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Alten Gould" <beastwarsaddress@h...> wrote:
> Whatever, I personally don't care about your opinions. And I didn't 
mean to 
> send that note out publicly. It was supposed to be just for him 
only. I 
> didn't know that the address was for the NBW O.K., so lay off, NOW!
> If you don't like my posts, too bad. I'm playing by your rules, so 
there is 
> no reason the complain about what i wrote. If i wanted, i could 
have done 
> something worse, but i didn't beacue you all asked me not to do 
those sorts 
> of things when i first came in.
> So, if you don't like mine and Meg's ideas, i don't care. DON'T 
read them if 
> you don't like them. I did nothing wrong to anyone, i didn't use 
bad 
> language and i didn't do anything that would be considered wrong. 
These are 
> robots for one, they have NO breasts or anything. how could this be 
real 
> anyway? I've seen some of the stuff you guys write and it's pretty 
gross 
> too, so what the @#$$ are you guys complaining about? I didn't 
raise 
> complaints about any of that!
> Two, it's called comic relief. Have you ever heard of humour?
> So, i've had enough of your pointless whining. If you want to take 
this up, 
> do it in private e-mail. My addy is:                        
> beastwarsaddress@h...
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> >     As much as I enjoy watching pointless arguments, this could 
drive

amusing

objective

was
